输入后的作文题目内容

core_logic.logic: The flow starts on page 0. First, a user can click the poetry fill - in option '忙趁东风放纸鸢' (S1), or click the '换一换题目' button to get a new question (S2), or input a message in the message input box (S3), or click the home bottom navigation tab (S4). If S4 is clicked, on page 14, the user can input a composition title (S5), click the Chinese composition type button (S6), click the AI writing send button (S7), or click the genre selection dropdown (S8).

steps.summary: Click the poetry fill - in option '忙趁东风放纸鸢'
Click the '换一换题目' button
Input '今天天气真好' in the message input box
Click the home bottom navigation tab
Input '我的校园生活' in the composition title input box
Click the Chinese composition type button
Click the AI writing send button
Click the genre selection dropdown

FDG.function_description: The page functions as a grade - setting interface within an educational app, enabling users to choose their corresponding grade level from options covering preschool, elementary school, middle school, high school, and vocational school.

core_logic.logic: The user starts on the main page (page 0). They click the grade selection dropdown (action [0,0]), which opens the grade - setting interface (page 1). On this interface, the user can then choose their appropriate grade level from the available options like preschool, elementary school grades, middle school grades, high school grades, or vocational school grades.

steps.summary: Click the grade selection dropdown to open the grade - setting interface.

FDG.function_description: The current page in the educational app provides a search interface with various trending and categorized search topics (e.g., 热搜榜, 作文榜) and a text/voice input field for users to search for educational content, learning tools, or games.

core_logic.logic: The flow starts by clicking the search icon to open the search interface. Then, users can either input a search term (like '古诗赏析') and submit it, or close the search interface. If inputting, after entering text, clicking the send button submits the search, leading to a results page or further input. The close button exits the search interface back to the home page.

steps.summary: Click search icon to open search interface
Click close button to exit search interface
Input search term (e.g., 古诗赏析) in search box
Click send button to submit search input
Input search term (e.g., 古诗赏析) in search box (results page)
Click search submit button to finalize search

FDG.function_description: The current page appears to be a loading or empty state screen, likely intended to display notifications or related content after being accessed via the notification icon from the educational app's main page, though no actionable elements or content are currently visible.

core_logic.logic: The user starts on the main page (page 0) of the educational app. They click the notification icon (bell) at the top right. This action navigates to a new page (page 3), which currently shows a loading or empty state with no visible content or actionable elements yet.

steps.summary: Click the notification (bell) icon at the top right of the main page

FDG.function_description: The page displays the "历史记录" (History) section of an educational app, allowing users to view, categorize (by type like 搜整页, 搜单题, etc., and by subject like 数学, 语文, etc.) their past activity records, and provides a button to navigate to the problem - searching feature when there are no records.

core_logic.logic: The user starts on the app's home page (page 0) and clicks the '历史/最近' (History/Recent) icon. This navigates to the '历史记录' (History) page (page 4), where past activity records can be viewed, categorized by type (e.g., 搜整页, 搜单题) and subject (e.g., 数学, 语文). If there are no records, a '去搜题' (Go to Search Problem) button is available to navigate to the problem - searching feature.

steps.summary: Click the '历史/最近' icon to navigate to the History page.

FDG.function_description: This page functions as a camera - based problem - searching interface in an educational app, enabling users to take photos of questions (with options to search single questions, whole pages, or compositions), and also providing additional features like translation, problem correction, handwriting removal, and wrong - question recording, while also supporting access to search history.
data_out: 进入搜索答疑功能界面

core_logic.logic: The flow starts by clicking the '搜索答疑' (Search & Q&A) button on the home page (page 0) to enter the camera - based problem - searching interface (page 5). From there, the user can choose to close the camera interface by clicking the close button, which will take them back to page 20.

Click the close button to exit the camera interface and go to page 20.

FDG.function_description: The current page is a calculator interface within an educational app, allowing users to input mathematical formulas (via text entry or camera - based input) and perform calculations using a variety of arithmetic and trigonometric functions, while also providing features like accessing usage instructions, viewing collection/history, and more.

In the calculator, the user can choose to input a formula via text, click a number button, click a trigonometric function button, or click the calculate button to perform the operation. The user can also click the back button to return to the home page.

Click the number 7 button
Click the calculate button to perform the calculation

After these inputs, the user can choose to either generate a writing idea first or directly generate the complete composition, with options for word count range and batch generation also available.
